General.Name: TCL Multimedia Technology Holdings Limited
General.Description: TCL Multimedia Technology Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, distributes, and sells colour television sets in the People's Republic of China, Europe, North America, and internationally. It operates through Television and Others segments. The company offers 3D and LED TVs, ice screens, and accessories; and DVD players, dockings, and sound bars. It is also involved in the information technology and other businesses, including the manufacture and sale of television related components; and the sale of white goods, mobile phones, and air conditioners. The company is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. TCL Multimedia Technology Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of T.C.L. Industries Holdings (H.K.) Limited.
